short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It formats the elapsed time in the progress bar, adds break lines and converts URL strings into anchor links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension formats the elapsed time in the progress bar, adds breaklines and converts URL strings into anchor links in the comments box.
